name: Road Breaker
description:
You have a debt to pay and only a few days to do it.

(Bug – When in combat do not click on the cargo carts, this can cause the game to freeze as they a trying to use a turret they don't have.)

Escort cargo across the desert while being hunted. The more cargo you haul the bigger the payout but expect more company on the road. 

If one of your carts is damaged enough it will slow you down, at that point you can disconnect it and get away with something instead of nothing.

Bring the fight to them by buying gun carts, just give the cart a target and they won’t stop shooting till that target’s dead.
